title: Question 94:
description: What are the incentives of the Synthetix system?

fields.title: Answer
fields.value:
Synthetix has a number of different ways to incentivise participants to create a healthy platform. You may for example have heard about rewards for holding certain inverse synths like iBTC or iETH.

You can read about the current incentives here: [Incentives - Synthetix System Documentation](https://docs.synthetix.io/incentives/)
